content: remaining 6 sts and weave in end © the forever hug plush shop 2025 all rights reserved forever hug bear heart accessory attachment position the heart between each arm centered in front of the belly use the same yarn that was used to make the heart and sew each side of the heart to the inside of each arm weave ends into heart thank you for creating with the forever hug plush shop the forever hug heart was designed as a small but meaningful companion created to be held gifted and stitched with intention whether it s nestled into the arms of a forever hug bear or made on it s own this heart represents love comfort and connection in its simplest form thank you for choosing to bring this piece to life whether you re making it as a gift an addition to a special project or a quiet reminder of care and warmth we hope it becomes something truly meaningful we would love to see your finished work share your creations with us on social media @theforeverhugplush keep stitching keep smiling and remember every hug you make lasts forever © the forever hug plush shop 2025 all rights reserved
